summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; adding a new Chapter 23.55 to the Seattle Municipal Code to establish standards for signs in all zone classifications; amending Sections 23.44.110, 23.76.006B, 23.84.002, 23.84.004, 23.84.006, 23.84.010, 23.84.012, 23.84.024, 23.84.025, 23.84.030, 23.84.032, 23.84.036, 23.84.038, 23.84.042, 23.86.040, 24.44.010, 24.44.090,24.52.010, 24.52.120, 24.54.010, 24.54.120, 24.56.010, 24.56.050, 24.58.010 and 24.58.040; repealing Sections 23.44.017I, 23.44.022K, 23.44.056, 23.45.100D, 23.45.112, 23.45.158, 23.48.016, and 23.49.040; and amending, renumbering and/or repealing Sections 4901-4927 of the Seattle Amendments to the 1982 Uniform Building Code.
